Commands.Power Break (IX): 3-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants a medium probability of inflicting Small Attack Down for 2 turns.  Deals more damage if the target is a humanoid.
Commands.Spellblade: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Deals more damage if the target is a humanoid.

Passives.BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Power Break (IX) Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Power Break (IX).
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Power Break (IX) Charge: Increases the max uses of Power Break (IX) by 1.
Passives.Spellblade Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Spellblade.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Spellblade Charge: Increases the max uses of Spellblade by 1.
Passives.Man Eater: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt to Humanoid-type targets.
Passives.A Captain's Duty: Slightly raises Attack  when HP is under 20%.
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed: Slightly raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Power Break (IX) Extend: Increases the max uses of Power Break (IX) by 1.Raises own BRV based on the sum of the party's Max BRV.Moderately raises the potency of Power Break (IX).Grants Small Attack Up for 5 turns.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 5 turns after using Power Break (IX).BRV Attack+ deals higher damage to Humanoid-type targets.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Spellblade Extend: Raises own BRV based on the sum of the party's Max BRV.Slightly raises the potency of Spellblade.Grants Medium Max BRV Up for 6 turns.If HP is above 80% Max HP, triggers an HP attack which deals 50% HP damage to other enemies.

Weapons.Rune Blade CP: 15: Increases the potency of Power Break (IX).Raises the success rate of Attack Down and extends its duration.
Weapons.Diamond Sword CP: 35: Increases Spellblade's potency.Grants Small Defense Up and BRV Regen for 4 turns.
